title: I think overall this product was good
author: Kim Possible
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2024
review_text: However, I have cats. Cats are jerks. They ripped what I was using this on right off the door less than five hours after using it. So I can’t tell you if it lasts or how it held up. I will not buy again as the cats are still here and still awful. But if you do not have cats this would be good for you.
product_title: Scotch Mounting, Fastening & Surface Protection 3M Scotch Extreme Mounting Tape, 1 by 60-Inch, Black (414P)

title: Impossible to peel off the backing
author: karibu
date: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
review_text: ARGH!!!! The backing does not peel off. I ended up throwing the whole damn thing away after fighting with it. It was just impossible to use.
product_title: Scotch Mounting, Fastening & Surface Protection 3M Scotch Extreme Mounting Tape, 1 by 60-Inch, Black (414P)

title: Stong
author: NCGaston
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
review_text: Needed some extra strength mounting tape. It’s good stuff.
product_title: Scotch Mounting, Fastening & Surface Protection 3M Scotch Extreme Mounting Tape, 1 by 60-Inch, Black (414P)

title: The only thing it sticks to is the red vinyl backing tape!
author: William J. Keaton
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
review_text:
Useless. It has been recommended for mounting a dash camera. I've mounted my camera twice and it lasted about 2 days each time. And I park in an underground garage, so no direct sunlight.
Do not use on glass, it just doesn't last.
The best thing that it sticks to is the red vinyl backing tape. That stuff is very difficult to remove.
product_title: Scotch Mounting, Fastening & Surface Protection 3M Scotch Extreme Mounting Tape, 1 by 60-Inch, Black (414P)

title: not as easy to use as i thought. but it got the job done.
author: Mandy
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
review_text: bought these to mount audio panels. which does hold when you can get the tape on. the worst part of using the role of tape I received was peeling off the red adhesive tape off. it was a pain. i can only anticipate, i received a roll from a bad batch.
product_title: Scotch Mounting, Fastening & Surface Protection 3M Scotch Extreme Mounting Tape, 1 by 60-Inch, Black (414P)

title: Waste of money
author: Erin
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
review_text: I used 2 pieces of tape to hang a very light shelf with very light objects on it. The total weight couldn’t have surpassed a pound or two. It fell right off the wall in the middle of the night the same day that I put it up. Not only did I break my objects, but I lost sleep over this horrible product. Just put screws in the wall. Don’t waste your time, energy, and money on this.
product_title: Scotch Mounting, Fastening & Surface Protection 3M Scotch Extreme Mounting Tape, 1 by 60-Inch, Black (414P)

It work great for outdoor!
I just hope there is more of it
product_title: Scotch Mounting, Fastening & Surface Protection 3M Scotch Extreme Mounting Tape, 1 by 60-Inch, Black (414P)

review_text: So glad I found this stuff! Even arrived early! Great for playing a prank on my brother. He came home to his coffee table and end tables stuck to the ceiling! I don't recommend this for safety reasons but it was a gas!

title: Completely unreliable!!!

date: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2022
review_text: I either received a lemon (not sure how that can even be with a mounting tape) or this is a completely inferior product. I have bought this brand before, although not as ""strong"" as advertised and honestly this is laughable as anything you tape with this falls off in less the 24 hours!
product_title: Scotch Mounting, Fastening & Surface Protection 3M Scotch Extreme Mounting Tape, 1 by 60-Inch, Black (414P)

title: 3M Makes the Best Double-Sided Tape I've Used
author: Amazon Customer
date: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2022
review_text: I use this for video camera mounting, has not failed me. I like the category "Easy to Remove" - If it were easy to remove it wouldn't work as well as it does. Category doesn't make sense for a "permanent" mount. Generally the 3M tapes are the best I've used, they are my default. I'd just recommend checking that the correct strength (weight rating) is used for your application, there are a few different strengths.
product_title: Scotch Mounting, Fastening & Surface Protection 3M Scotch Extreme Mounting Tape, 1 by 60-Inch, Black (414P)

date: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2021
review_text: While this did stick really well initially, it didn't hold when the temperature got above room temperature. I came in to find all of the items I had stuck had come loose. The items were surveillance cameras and they generated heat. The adhesive softened and the cameras fell out of the housings.
product_title: Scotch Mounting, Fastening & Surface Protection 3M Scotch Extreme Mounting Tape, 1 by 60-Inch, Black (414P)

review_text: This tape is a miracle! I have it mounting two gazing balls on stands on the top of my deck. Sturdy and reliable!!! The tape has now went through all 4 seasons here heavy storms etc and is still as secure as the first application. Trying it for solar motion lights next!

title: Great Tape
author: Snorkel68
date: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2021
review_text: I was reattaching the foam rubber sound deadening piece to the plastic panels on my SxS and needed a good quality tape. After checking the 3M website I settled on this tape. It was easy to work with and I was able to get the foam stuck on exactly where I needed it. I did have to wash the foam rubber first, as the first piece there was apparently dust in/on it and the dust made the tape not so sticky. That was my fault and after I had clean foam rubber this was awesome!
product_title: Scotch Mounting, Fastening & Surface Protection 3M Scotch Extreme Mounting Tape, 1 by 60-Inch, Black (414P)

title: Didn’t work
author: LG
date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2020
review_text:
Completely useless! I used it to tape my magnet board on the wall. It held up for a few hours until it dropped on the floor in the middle of the night. The tape only managed to damage my wall from the tape.
I also used it to tape a large picture frame with a glass. I used it the same day as the magnet board and my picture frame lasted until the next afternoon. No damage to the wall but it basically broke my frame. Not only did I waste money on this useless mounting tape but now I have to spend money to replace my frame.
I also used it to tape a very light small painting. This one managed to stay up until the day after my picture frame dropped.
I will not be buying again.

title: Did not stick well

date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2019
review_text:
I used this to mount a power strip under my desk. Lining the whole backside of the strip, and applying it to a freshly cleaned (with alcohol) surface, the tape gave out and the power strip fell after about one week.

I do not recommend this product. It could not support something less than 3-4 pounds over about 14 inches.

title: Holds like a weld. Feels permanent.
author: Jesse Yeager
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2019
review_text:
This stuff is like a roll of super glue. It holds strong.

I cut a strip off of the roll and then tried cutting the strip length-wise to make thinner strips, but that ain't happening. Scissors got stuck.

Since this stuff is so sticky, measure and get everything right the first time. Get the right size for your task.
product_title: Scotch Mounting, Fastening & Surface Protection 3M Scotch Extreme Mounting Tape, 1 by 60-Inch, Black (414P)

title: Awesome tape
author: Kristi
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2019
review_text: Love this tape.. it hold anything you put together. It will not come apart. Best value for the money. I have fixed phone cases, magnet mounts, pop sockets and much more. Highly recommend

title: Best tape ever
author: JR
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2019
review_text: You can literally use a tiny piece and hold up something a little more to the heavier side. It sticks to every surface I’ve ever used it on. I would highly recommend. It may be a little rough to remove if need be but this tape works wonders and for a great price.
product_title: Scotch Mounting, Fastening & Surface Protection 3M Scotch Extreme Mounting Tape, 1 by 60-Inch, Black (414P)

title: It sticks
author: MrSept
date: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2019
review_text: I use it a lot around the house for various things. I also use it to mount the dash cam. It works a lot better than regular tape and won't melt/dislodge in CA hot summer. Only thing is it won't stick to rubber or masonry. Must be very smooth surface like glass.
product_title: Scotch Mounting, Fastening & Surface Protection 3M Scotch Extreme Mounting Tape, 1 by 60-Inch, Black (414P)

title: Could not withstand half the weight mentioned in the description.
author: Anshu
date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2019
review_text: Utterly disappoined. Could not even withstand half the weight mentioned in the description. Speaker fell out a week later with loud bang waking me in the middle of a night.
product_title: Scotch Mounting, Fastening & Surface Protection 3M Scotch Extreme Mounting Tape, 1 by 60-Inch, Black (414P)

title: It had ONE job...
author: Notimpressed
date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2019
review_text: I bought this for an under-the-cabinet coffee k-cup pod holder. It stayed in place for under a month. It is not heavy....
product_title: Scotch Mounting, Fastening & Surface Protection 3M Scotch Extreme Mounting Tape, 1 by 60-Inch, Black (414P)

title: Not worth the high price ... it does not hold !
author: mister g
date: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2019
review_text: I used it to hold a plastic two section wall file which weighted less than a pound , after three days it was coming off the wall .. I pressed it back on .. but two or three days later it fell off the wall . Not worth the high price !
product_title: Scotch Mounting, Fastening & Surface Protection 3M Scotch Extreme Mounting Tape, 1 by 60-Inch, Black (414P)
